mapper.sql: select s.study_no, s.name study_title, ss.subject_no subject_no, ss.name subject_name, s.area, s.no_people, sfs.face_no face_no, sfs.name face_name, s.introduction, s.created_dt, s.member_no owner_no, m.nickname owner_name, p.point study_point, s.status, s.whether_report, (select count(*) from study_guilder where study_no=s.study_no and status=2) count_guilder, (select count(*) from study_guilder where study_no=s.study_no and status=1) count_wating_guilder, (select count(*) from study_bookmark where study_no=s.study_no) count_bookmark from study s left outer join study_subject ss on s.subject_no=ss.subject_no left outer join study_face_status sfs on s.face_no=sfs.face_no left outer join member m on s.member_no=m.member_no left outer join study_guilder sg on s.study_no=sg.study_no left outer join member m2 on sg.member_no=m2.member_no left outer join study_bookmark sb on s.study_no=sb.study_no left outer join point p on s.study_no=p.study_no
select sg.member_no, m.name member_name, m.nickname member_nickname from study_guilder sg join member m on m.member_no=sg.member_no

select sbm.study_no, s.study_no, s.name study_title, ss.subject_no subject_no, ss.name subject_name, s.area, s.no_people, sfs.face_no face_no, sfs.name face_name, s.introduction, s.created_dt, s.member_no owner_no, m.nickname owner_name, m2.member_no member_no, m2.name member_name, m2.nickname member_nickname, p.point study_point, s.status, s.whether_report, (select count(*) from study_guilder where study_no=s.study_no and status=2) count_guilder, (select count(*) from study_bookmark where study_no=s.study_no) count_bookmark from study_bookmark sbm left outer join study s on s.study_no=sbm.study_no left outer join member m on m.member_no=s.member_no left outer join member m2 on m2.member_no=sbm.member_no left outer join study_subject ss on s.subject_no=ss.subject_no left outer join study_face_status sfs on s.face_no=sfs.face_no left outer join point p on s.study_no=p.study_no
select sg.member_no, sg.study_no, sg.status, s.name from study_guilder sg left outer join study s on s.study_no=sg.study_no
mapper.insert: insert into study (name, subject_no, no_people, face_no, introduction, area, member_no) values (#{studyTitle}, #{subjectNo}, #{numberOfPeple}, #{faceNo}, #{introduction}, #{area}, #{owner.perNo})
mapper.update: update study set status=2 where study_no=#{studyNo}
update study set status=3 where study_no=#{studyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from study where study_no=#{studyNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: where ${input} like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) group by s.study_no order by s.created_dt
where s.status=1 or s.status=2 group by s.study_no order by s.created_dt
where s.status=1 group by s.study_no order by s.created_dt
where s.status=2 group by s.study_no order by s.created_dt
where s.study_no=#{studyNo} and (s.member_no=#{memberNo} or sg.member_no=#{memberNo}) and (s.status=1 or s.status=2)
mapper.update: update study_guilder set status=2 where study_no=#{studyNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
update study_guilder set status=3 where study_no=#{studyNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
update study_guilder set status=3 where study_no=#{studyNo}
